sourcesContent:
import {
  Box,
  Flex,
  Link,
  List,
  ListItem,
  Text,
  VStack,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

const Footer = () => {
  return (
    <Box as="footer" py={12} bg="gray.50" color="gray.600" fontSize="sm">
      <Flex
        direction={{ base: "column", md: "row" }}
        justify="space-between"
        align="center"
        maxW="1200px"
        mx="auto"
        px={4}
      >
        <VStack align="flex-start" spacing={4}>
          <Text>© 2023 My Graphics. All rights reserved.</Text>
          <List spacing={2}>
            <ListItem>
              <Link href="https://twitter.com/mygraphics" isExternal>
                Twitter
              </Link>
            </ListItem>
            <ListItem>
              <Link href="https://github.com/mygraphics" isExternal>
                GitHub
              </Link>
            </ListItem>
            <ListItem>
              <Link href="/about">About</Link>
            </ListItem>
            <ListItem>
              <Link href="/contact">Contact</Link>
            </ListItem>
          </List>
        </VStack>
        <VStack align="flex-start" spacing={4}></VStack>
      </Flex>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Footer;
